Wessex BBA Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wessex Brass Band Association wessex-brass-band-association-contest

Best A section march: Verwood Concert Brass Best B section march: Ocean Brass
South Wilts Cup for best interpretation: Paul Williams, Downton Best instrumentalist: Ian Harris, euphonium, Verwood Concert Brass Best euphonium: John Starkes, Bournemouth Concert Brass Best cornet: Elaine Close, Verwood Concert Brass Best percussion: Bournemouth Concert Brass Best bass section: Bournemouth Concert Brass Best trombone section: Verwood Concert Brass
